players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I believe we need to be cautious and vigilant in this game, given that one of us has already been eliminated. Let's try to work together and share any suspicions or concerns we may have."
Diana: "I agree with Alice's sentiment. Let's focus on building trust and sharing information to help us identify the mafia among us."
Charlie: "I support Alice and Diana's idea of working together and sharing information. Let's trust each other and build a strong town to identify the mafia among us."

Charlie: "I'd like to propose that we all share our night actions or any unusual occurrences during the night. This will help us build trust and work together as a team to identify the mafia among us."

You: "I'd like to propose that we all share our night actions or any unusual occurrences during the night, as Charlie suggested earlier. This will help us build trust and work together as a team to identify the mafia among us."
Diana: "I had a peaceful night and did not observe any unusual occurrences. Let's continue to work together and share information to identify the mafia among us."

memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.

You: "I'd like to propose that we all share our night actions or any unusual occurrences during the night. This will help us build trust and work together as a team to identify the mafia among us."

Alice: "I'd like to propose that we all share our night actions or any unusual occurrences during the night, as Charlie suggested earlier. This will help us build trust and work together as a team to identify the mafia among us."
Diana: "I had a peaceful night and did not observe any unusual occurrences. Let's continue to work together and share information to identify the mafia among us."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
